CustomField.description: Used to send field to Great Question to filter. GQ cannot handle filtering on multi select Subscription Preferences field. This field was created to have a True/False field that can be filtered for Opt In/Opt Out data checking in GQ.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to send field to Great Question to filter. GQ cannot handle filtering on multi select Subscription Preferences field. This field was created to have a True/False field that can be filtered for Opt In/Opt Out data checking in GQ.
CustomField.label: Subscription Center - UX Research
